title: Big Buck Bunny
description: A large and lovable rabbit is the star of this animated film, which follows his adventures in a world filled with talking animals and other fantastical creatures.

title: Sintel
description: A young woman with a mysterious past lands in a town where a sinister force haunts the populace with the appearance of a child's mannequin.

title: Tears of Steel
description: A group of soldiers fight against a giant robot in a post-apocalyptic world.

title: Elephant's Dream
description: Two friends discover a magical world hidden beneath their own in this stop-motion animated film.
